org.apache.flink.spargel.java.examples

Class SpargelPageRank.RankMessenger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.spargel.java.MessagingFunction<Long,Double,Double,Double>
      • org.apache.flink.spargel.java.examples.SpargelPageRank.RankMessenger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    SpargelPageRank

    public static final class SpargelPageRank.RankMessenger
extends MessagingFunction<Long,Double,Double,Double>
    Distributes the rank of a vertex among all target vertices according to the transition probability, which is associated with an edge as the edge value.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void sendMessages(Long vertexId, Double newRank)
      This method is invoked once per superstep for each vertex that was changed in that superstep.

    • Constructor Detail

        public SpargelPageRank.RankMessenger()

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessages

        public void sendMessages(Long vertexId,
                Double newRank)
        Description copied from class: MessagingFunction
        This method is invoked once per superstep for each vertex that was changed in that superstep. It needs to produce the messages that will be received by vertices in the next superstep.
        Specified by:
        sendMessages in class MessagingFunction<Long,Double,Double,Double>
        Parameters:
        vertexId - The key of the vertex that was changed.
        newRank - The value (state) of the vertex that was changed.
